body.para: I've noticed that happen to me several times, however, it's only happened when doing development. I figured that the multiple hot-deploys & all the class reloading caused the JVM to get into a bad state, which is why you need to 'kill -s 9' it. I haven't noticed it during acceptance testing tho, when I'm not reloading the web-app multiple times.
